message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.NE 

This paper deals with video surveillance systems and proposes a technique to increase robustness and reduce computational complexity in a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) based anomaly detector that utilizes the optical flow information of video data. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also discusses denoising operation during inference and the use of Generative Adversarial Network (GAN) during training, which are techniques commonly used in machine learning and deep learning. Therefore, the other likely categories are cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.MM (Multimedia), and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
